title: HOUR 1 - Westbrook, Cowboys, Rams, NBA
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Westbrook, Cowboys, Rams, NBA
description:
The Lakers need to move off of Russell Westbrook as soon as they can

The Cowboys are rumored to be cutting Amari Cooper and the Rams will be bringing back Odell Beckham Jr.

Who will be the next face of the NBA?

QBs to focus on at the NFL Combine


Guest: Albert Breer

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
